channel.title: Stuff Spining In My Head on Ahmed Ayman
channel.description: Recent content in Stuff Spining In My Head on Ahmed Ayman

item.title: LIFE IS DETERMINISTIC, HMMMM, OR NOT.
item.description: If someday, somehow we managed to see the future, that means the future is deterministic. It means that every thing that will ever happen is predetermined; because if we can see it or predict it with some technology then it’s already there, and our choices have been already made! We just had to observe it. Let’s just assume for a minute that we’re okay with living without free-will. But now when we know exactly what’s gonna happen after say five seconds from now, you can change it right?
